text: illeogalodoe hananim oee da leun geos-ol gyeongbaehajaneun mal-inyo geugeos deul-eun uliege iigdo sonsildo jul su eobsnola hananim-eulobuteo indo bad-eun hu ileul geoyeoghago satan-e yuhogdoeeo jisang-eul banghwanghaneun umaehanjaga olh-eun gillo indohaneun ulie gelo ola buleuna illeogalodoe ha nanim-ui bog-eumman-i gil-iyo saengmyeong-euloulineun inlyuui junimkkeman sunjongham-eulmyeonglyeongbad-assnola
